> [montecarlo](#comment_2_14YF6gMYCfUxtez1sJ8btUkD9u8Q4P6h9H): Impossible. Google has no power over ZeroNet because it's distributed across thousands of users. The very posts you're reading are stored and seeded across each participant's PC and not a singular network, so the content is pretty much immutable unless you choose to block the user id. ZeroNet is not beholden to the constraints of clearnet. No DNS so CloudFlare cannot censor it. It cannot be indexed nor blacklisted by Google. The only way to kill ZeroNet is to kill the trackers, as far as I know.

Trackers can be decentralized as long as a perspective user can find some bootstrapping information somewhere about atleast a couple of currently active nodes. I suspect we might be vulnerable to DDOS until the network is massive. If someone with a botnet with thousands or tens of thousands of IPs started connecting to everyone and not sharing any data thus making 95% of the peers you are connected to non functional and requesting data and throwing it out there by clogging the few remaining legitimate seeders ability to distribute files to real people... that would be a tough nut to crack.

And so yea, niggers, they are like a literal plague. A blight. Like locusts and breed like them too. They devour and destroy everywhere they go. If they get anywhere NEAR your property you have to sell and move before its value implodes. If you are in their area of town YOU BETTER HAVE ENOUGH GAS IN YOUR CAR AND PRAY YOU GET IT SERVICED REGULARLY. Jews aren't beautiful, but they don't look like fucking monkies. > [spiegel](#comment_5_1DgsQGyxp1NPfxDHSUs3Efj8jPvfrGsYyd): This literally doesn't matter. Jews rape kids. Non-jewish kids, YOUR kids if they could. /Shrug. You just don't know who I am and the values I have. I'm a true reactionary. I don't fundamentally oppose society having elites. I don't oppose the strong dominating the weak. They want me to be their slave? I'm not that offended by that because I also want them to be my slave. They starved to death hundreds of millions? Yea that's pretty shitty. I don't know if I could do the same to them. But I have the wherewithal to recognize that that's probably weakness on my part. A crocodile doesn't stop to contemplate the feelings of his meal, he just conquers. You aren't human in their eyes? Are they human in your eyes? Why hate someone for something you are guilty of yourself? 

I read your whole post as "my opponent is winning and not me and therefor I hate him". Well I'm sorry, thats not a good reason to hate someone, not to me.

Life is fundamentally about competition. Humans never escaped from nature and its games and we never will. The strong out compete the week spread their genes and the weak die. Through this process the species grows stronger. Life is Darwinian. Except for being clever AF we are animals just like all the rest.

Now, all that being said, I do have some reasons that I don't like them. I don't like how their strategies resemble that of a parasite. I don't like how they focus more on bringing others down than raising themselves up. I don't like how the get power through destruction instead of creation. Where as whites are the opposite. We build to elevate ourselves rather than tearing down others to make ourselves seem taller. When we conquer we do it with honor rather than subterfuge and subversion.

But I would argue that preference for being around people is always going to boil down to aesthetics. How annoying they are how much they stink. So maybe the Jew who is near me is thinking in his heady "filthy goy" when he looks at me, so what? I'm thinking "filthy jew" in my head, even steven. Atleast he isn't chimping out and stinking and dripping grease everywhere. He can think what ever he wants, I can be around unpleasant thoughts, I can't be around unpleasant noises, odors, and crashing property values if it's my property.
